title: Green Arrow and Black Canary, Vol. 1: The Wedding Album
description: After an on-again/off-again courtship of superheroic proportions, Green Arrow finally asked for Black Canary's hand in marriage. Now, the real story begins! Will this star-crossed couple make it down the aisle? Guest-starring The Justice League of America and many of the DC Universe's top villains. Included in this title are the tales from the GREEN ARROW/BLACK CANARY WEDDING SPECIAL, the JUSTICE LEAGUE OF AMERICA WEDDING SPECIAL, and THE BLACK CANARY WEDDING PLANNER. Also included is Black Canary's 4-part solo adventure that led up to her decision to accept Green Arrow's marriage proposal.
author: Judd Winick
